import { Component,Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-top-rated-album-section', templateUrl: './top-rated-album-section.component.html', styleUrls: ['./top-rated-album-section.component.scss'] }) export class TopRatedAlbumSectionComponent { @Input() rowName!: string; constructor(private route: Router){ } navigateToAlbumPage(){ this.route.navigate(['AlbumPage']) } }
